title: can't build javadocs for contrib lucli
description:
using the 3_1 branch, "ant javadoc" is currently spitting this out...


    [mkdir] Created dir: /home/hossman/lucene/3_1_branch/lucene/build/docs/api/contrib-lucli
  [javadoc] Generating Javadoc
  [javadoc] Javadoc execution
  [javadoc] Loading source files for package java.lucli...
  [javadoc] Constructing Javadoc information...
  [javadoc] javadoc: warning - No source files for package java.lucli
  [javadoc] javadoc: error - No public or protected classes found to document.
  [javadoc] 1 error
  [javadoc] 1 warning
      [jar] Building jar: /home/hossman/lucene/3_1_branch/lucene/build/contrib/lucli/lucene-lucli-3.1-SNAPSHOT-javadoc.jar

comments.content:
i haven't had a chance to dig into this yet, so i'm filing it as a fix for 3.1 bug in case someone else has a chance to figure out the problem.

i doubt it should be considered a blocker however.
comments.author: Hoss Man
